idea-plugin.name: Debug Variable Extractor
idea-plugin.description:
Extract JSON or Java code from variables in debugger. If you are looking for a more comprehensive tool, see also Debug Variable Save Load.


Usage

When stopped at breakpoint while debugging, you can right click on a variable and select "Extract Value...". The selected variable will be serialized to JSON or Java code with possibility to get copied to your clipboard.


NOTES

  • This plugin utilizes debugger API, which collects all values available in debugger and thus will generate a more complete JSON string than Debug Variable Save Load.

Authors

  • chocovon
  • Henady Zakalusky

action.description: Extract and copy debug variable as Java or JSON code from debugger.
